amendment.description: To provide additional funding for special education programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 217 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 217 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S1353-1354) To provide additional funding for special education programs.
